forumNotes.author: Zoso
forumNotes.content:
seems USBoot.org, my favorite boot XP tool of all time is down. hope its just temporary since the tool is not useable without it due to having to get a pass code online each time you used it. I used that for many things other than booting XP from USB, it is great! hope to see it back soon. anyone know whats going on with it? I remember seeing Gerd Ross (the author) post here in the past. hopefully he will see this and let us know.
thanks

forumNotes.author: ambralivio
forumNotes.content:
Zoso,

this is strange because I was able to browse within the site (see attachmet).

I do not follow that site, but it seems that it works, even if they are declaring to have some trouble lastly.

forumNotes.author: Zoso
forumNotes.content:
hi ambralivio,  

interesting... yes, seems all the other linkage from usboot.org works! only the main entry [https://usboot.org](https://usboot.org "External link") is not.   

results in error message "Sorry, but the domain you specified does not exist on this server!  
Please check the URL for typing errors ..."  

I will try to message the forum admin about it. this link is working: [https://www.usboot.o...m.php?forumId=1](https://www.usboot.org/tiki-view_forum.php?forumId=1 "External link")  

which is good to see because there is some good infos available on that one too.  

thanks
